body: Thanks for your support Mostapha, :) The thing is that I sitll have the same problem as before, even with your new script. My lamp is not visible. I got an empty parameter. I have used a lamp from XAL check out the escript and the IES file [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zYvUvcLXovBqGkiQ4Vyjcf8vkjKievN7r5UiB25Bd8gWfvypbOdLt5oWHpeBN4Y2qHVOkUHWqhJ9UesAoIwASKEV7DUvXSPo/EMPTYOUTPUT.png)
